fixed_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 150.0%/157.5%/165.0% of Attack. 50.0%/52.5%/55.0% chance to inflict Burn on foe. If no foes are Burning, this chance is doubled.
fixed_skill.name: Bonfire Festival

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Agilao

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Maragion

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. Increase Burn accuracy by 35%. When foes are Burning, increase party's Attack by 10% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Glamorous Greed

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. Increase Burn accuracy by 40%. When foes are Burning, increase party's Attack by 12% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Glamorous Greed I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
